casebody.data:
Joyce THURLOW, Personal Representative of the Estate of Kenneth Thurlow, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
WILLIAM BEAUMONT HOSPITAL and Todd Singleton, CRNA, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Michael Sikorsky, D.O., and American Anesthesiology of Michigan, P.C., Defendants. SC: 158787
COA: 343817 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 25, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellants to extend the time for filing their reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before February 6, 2019.
